data.message: Eminem (Marshall Mathers) is, and always will be, that original artist everyone will always try to copy (yet never can replicate).  And Eminem was, and still is, my biggest musical influence (as I bet I'm the 1000000000th person to write this).  Maybe one day my Hip Hop music will take-off, and we can drink a beer together while laughing about being entertainers and people believing whatever we say...
